about_the_game:
She has been exploring cyberspace for years and she is prepared to serve as your very competent guide. Grab the headset and slip into the VR realm of pleasure, you will be in safe hands.

This PHOTO PACK contains:

- three new photos to hack.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: Intel i3 2100+ or AMD FX-4100+
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM, OpenGL 3.2+ compatible, nVidia GT 720+ or AMD HD 5450+ or Intel HD Graphics 5000+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14
  • Processor: Intel i5 2400+ or AMD Phenom II X4 850+
  • Graphics: 1024 MB VRAM, OpenGL 3.2+ compatible, nVidia GTX 750+ or AMD Radeon HD 7770M+ or Intel HD Graphics 5300+
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
